title: Research and Advisory Services
description: IIREM conducts cutting-edge research with industry partners, government agencies, and academic institutions. We provide advisory and consultancy services to stakeholders in the real estate sector, offering expert insights and recommendations for informed decision-making.

title: Industry Immersion Programs
description: IIREM provides industry immersion programs that allow students to gain hands-on experience through internships and real estate project assignments. These programs facilitate practical learning, industry exposure, and networking with professionals, preparing students for the realities of the real estate sector.
